title: cant open league client since 8.21
body: ive restarted my macbook countless times and legit re-installled league and still get the same result; league tries to open for like 5-10 seconds and then closes. is it just me or can i get some help. currently updating my ios to macOS Mojave

replies.body: Greetings! Try the solutions provided in the [**Bug Splat and Game Crashes**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#section-mac) Riot Support article, and let me know if anything on there worked. If not, we can definitely run through some other options to further troubleshoot.

My issue lies with the actual installation of the game i have attempted everything outside of fixing corrupt files because i don't have the option to initiate a full repair of the game since i can't open the client and I have yet to download macOS Majove. But when i attempted to shutdown and do the NVRAM reset league immediately attempted to open up but proceeded to jump up and down on the dock and than disappear and when i check activity monitor it says league of legends is not responding anymore

I can understand that the client crashing is preventing you from repairing the client. Try, instead, to use the Hectech Repair Tool (HRT) to repair your client:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

I have updated to macOS Majove and now I have attempted to use teh hextech repair tool but it gets stuck at gathering logs but there is still a logs folder on my desktop outside of this the problem as mentioned before still persists.
same, hextech repair tool gets stuck at gathering logs. league client still fails to open regardless of how many times i've restarted my ios and reinstalled - i've reinstalled a total of 4 times now

I sent a ticket and got it fixed to riot games shout out to Platypus for the help. He recommended this : " if you go into your Finder and go to the Documents tab there should be a league of Legends folder, go ahead and delete that" . Also i had a program called hamachi which i deleted and it worked so now i am currently patching league of legends :) hope this works for u BasedDurrySenpai

I am currently having the issue and i have tried to reinstall and after the intial 1500 mb of download it the league icon jumps up and down and jsut disappears and than it just says its not responding.
i've updated my ios and re-installed for the second time now and still getting the same results. need help from rioter asap! i just want to play the game man

Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They will be able to help you more than anyone on boards.
